article_title: UN: Many displaced Gazans 'living in the open'
sentence: It  launched  its  offensive  in  Gaza  after  Hamas's  deadly  7  October  attack,  in  which  1,200  people  were  killed  and  a  further  240  taken  hostage.

article_title: UN: Many displaced Gazans 'living in the open'
sentence: More  than  21,672  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  that  date,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
